long_description: The Gomite Tiltpod digital camera base gives your point-and-shoot camera a tiny, tiltable tripod stand that fits on the included wrist strap-enjoy steady, stable photos almost anywhere! Nickel-plated positioning pivot offers maximum range of motion and precision control; it works in both portrait and landscape orientations. Grippy, magnetic base can be quickly attached and removed from a camera-it's like a mini tripod that fits in your pocket! The Gomite Tiltpod tripod digital camera base comes with magnetic base and wrist strap. Note: maximum recommended camera weight is 7 oz. (200g); this product is not compatible with interchangeable-lens cameras.
